theorem closure_eq_closure_interior_closure_of_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 A → closure (A : Set X) = closure (interior (closure A)) := by
  intro hP3
  dsimp [Topology.P3] at hP3
  apply subset_antisymm
  · have h₁ : closure (A : Set X) ⊆ closure (interior (closure A)) := by
      exact closure_mono hP3
    simpa using h₁
  · have h₂ : interior (closure A) ⊆ closure A := interior_subset
    have h₂' : closure (interior (closure A)) ⊆ closure A := closure_mono h₂
    simpa using h₂'

theorem P3_iff_isOpen_of_isClosed {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hA_closed : IsClosed (A : Set X)) :
    Topology.P3 A ↔ IsOpen (A : Set X) := by
  constructor
  · intro hP3
    dsimp [Topology.P3] at hP3
    -- Since `A` is closed, its closure is itself.
    have h_closure : closure (A : Set X) = A := hA_closed.closure_eq
    -- Using `P3`, we obtain `A ⊆ interior A`.
    have hSub : (A : Set X) ⊆ interior A := by
      simpa [h_closure] using hP3
    -- Together with `interior_subset`, this yields equality.
    have hEq : (A : Set X) = interior A :=
      subset_antisymm hSub interior_subset
    -- The interior of any set is open; hence `A` is open.
    simpa [hEq] using isOpen_interior
  · intro hA_open
    -- Every open set satisfies `P3`.
    exact (Topology.isOpen_has_all_Ps (X := X) (A := A) hA_open).2.2

theorem P3_union {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A B : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 A → Topology.P3 B → Topology.P3 (A ∪ B) := by
  intro hA hB
  dsimp [Topology.P3] at hA hB ⊢
  intro x hx
  cases hx with
  | inl hxA =>
      -- `x` comes from `A`
      have hx_in : x ∈ interior (closure A) := hA hxA
      have hMono : interior (closure A) ⊆ interior (closure (A ∪ B)) := by
        have : closure A ⊆ closure (A ∪ B) := by
          simpa using closure_mono (Set.subset_union_left : (A : Set X) ⊆ A ∪ B)
        exact interior_mono this
      exact hMono hx_in
  | inr hxB =>
      -- `x` comes from `B`
      have hx_in : x ∈ interior (closure B) := hB hxB
      have hMono : interior (closure B) ⊆ interior (closure (A ∪ B)) := by
        have : closure B ⊆ closure (A ∪ B) := by
          simpa using closure_mono (Set.subset_union_right : (B : Set X) ⊆ A ∪ B)
        exact interior_mono this
      exact hMono hx_in
